metadata.Title: CVE-2021-33515 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The submission service in Dovecot before 2.3.15 allows STARTTLS command injection in lib-smtp. Sensitive information can be redirected to an attacker-controlled address.

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Fabian Ising and Damian Poddebniak of MÃ¼nster University of Applied Sciences

criterions.comment: dovecot: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
